channel.title: Machine Learning on Shirin's playgRound
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Shirin's playgRound

item.title: data2day
item.description: Yesterday and today I attended the data2day conference in Heidelberg, Germany. Topics covered technical aspects of implementing Big Data, Data Science, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence and Internet of Things in business. While I spent most of the time at my company’s conference stand, I did hear three very interesting talks. Guten Morgen auf der @data2day Kommt uns doch mal am Stand besuchen :-) pic.twitter.com/YK46ACdNj9 — codecentric AG (@codecentric) September 27, 2017 Scalable Machine Learning with Apache Spark for Fraud Detection In this first talk I heard, Dr.

item.title: Data Science for Fraud Detection
item.description: I have written the following post about Data Science for Fraud Detection at my company codecentric’s blog: Fraud can be defined as “the crime of getting money by deceiving people” (Cambridge Dictionary); it is as old as humanity: whenever two parties exchange goods or conduct business there is the potential for one party scamming the other. With an ever increasing use of the internet for shopping, banking, filing insurance claims, etc.
